root.name: .extend()

example.code:
shopping_list = ['carrot', 'cucumber'] fruits = ['mango', 'pear'] print(shopping_list) # Prints ['carrot', 'cucumber']
shopping_list.extend(fruits) print(shopping_list) # Prints ['carrot', 'cucumber', 'mango', 'pear']

root.description: Extends a list by appending all of the elements of another list to the end.

parameter.label: x
parameter.description: list of items to append to original list
